name: str::<impl str>::to_lowercase::case_ignorable_then_cased

core::char::methods::<impl char>::is_cas.doc:
Returns `true` if this `char` has the `Cased` property.

 `Cased` is described in Chapter 4 (Character Properties) of the [Unicode Standard] and
 specified in the [Unicode Character Database][ucd] [`DerivedCoreProperties.txt`].

 [Unicode Standard]: https://www.unicode.org/versions/latest/
 [ucd]: https://www.unicode.org/reports/tr44/
 [`DerivedCoreProperties.txt`]: https://www.unicode.org/Public/UCD/latest/ucd/DerivedCoreProperties.txt

core::option::Option: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 904, kind: RigidTy(Char) })])
